outputs.output_descr: The sub-national authorities, organizations of persons with disabilities and wider public in two selected rayons of Kharkiv Oblast apply accessibility and universal design principles

Awareness among national authorities, civil society organisations of persons with disabilities and wider public on disability, accessibility and universal design principles raised at the national level.

project_descr: Promoting Mainstream Polices and Services for People with Disabilities in Ukraine
project_title: Mainstream policies and services for disabled people
